comment.body:
I propose:
```
! https://tiv1.am/ (01/02/2023)
tiv1.am##[class$=Banner i]
! https://tiv1.am/139865.html (01/02/2023)
tiv1.am##.news_des_block > a
```

comment.body:
> @Hc103113 Tried trial, but it seems they know that I am outside USA by my bank card number.
> 
> Details
> We can check a HAR file of the page with ads, if you agree. How to get a HAR file: https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/har_analyzer/ Please refresh the page after opening dev tools. And send it + link of this issue it to `filters@adguard.com`

Hi Alex,

have sent you the HAR file to filters@ via WeTransfer because the file was too large for an email attachment but I’m being prompted that the file is yet to be downloaded/will be erased in 2 days time. 

Thanks

issue.title: wordpress.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://wordpress.com/post/johnjronline.wordpress.com/88546](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwordpress.com%2Fpost%2Fjohnjronline.wordpress.com%2F88546) ### Comment Username: @goodjohnjr > There is a chance that AdGuard DNS's default AdGuard DNS filter is possibly causing an issue on WordPress.com when it blocks pixel.wp.com, where when you are editing a post, the image block when set to a hotlinked image, shrinks very small. > > At first, I thought that it was just a WordPress.com glitch, which has been happening for almost two weeks on almost all my posts, but it went away after I refreshed the page when I switched from AdGuard DNS to Quad9 when I was trying to figure out if Adguard For Windows or Adguard VPN or Adguard DNS was causing the problem; though this was just one quick test, so I am not sure if it will last. > > Anyway, I just wanted to ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/sqjxp7A.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/vTnump1.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdGuard DNS Browser: | Edge Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List

Other:
AdGuard DNS Other extensions used: | AdGuard VPN, AdGuard For Windows, Windows Security, Norton Safe Web, Microsoft Edge
